item.title: Navigating JavaScript ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüß≠
item.description: JavaScript is taking the world by storm, once used to add functionality to the web, now it is being used in almost all types of software development. For example, Using JavaScript you can do things like build Progressive Web Apps (web apps with native app like features) , create desktop apps using electron, make Android & iOS apps with React Native, do server stuff using Node and Express and many more.
